summary: Romantic, magical Valentine’s Day single-page website dedicated to Numa Sharma with elegant visuals, animations, interactive sections, countdown, and background music.
architectural_notes: Single-page, fully responsive (mobile-first) romantic Valentine’s Day site with smooth scrolling, animated effects (hearts/petals), and subtle glow/fade-in transitions.
Include background audio with user-controlled mute/unmute toggle.

existing_features.title: Create a fully responsive, single-page Valentine’s Day website dedicated to “Numa Sharma” with a magical, elegant, deeply romantic aesthetic using a soft palette of blush pink, deep red, champagne gold, and warm white, including subtle glow effects, smooth scrolling, and gentle fade-in transitions between sections.

Implement a hero section at the top of the homepage featuring the name “Numa Sharma” prominently in an elegant cursive or handwritten-style font, styled to feel romantic and premium (e.g., soft glow, subtle highlight, refined typography).
Add a “Love Message” section that presents a heartfelt, beautifully styled love letter in English with romantic letter-like formatting (e.g., paper/card feel, soft shadow, elegant spacing).

Create a romantic photo gallery section that displays a set of images in heart-shaped or softly rounded frames, with tasteful hover/tap interactions and responsive layout (grid on desktop, stacked/carousel-like behavior on mobile if needed).
Implement an interactive “Reasons Why I Love You” section where the user can click/tap items to reveal sweet messages (e.g., flip cards, accordion, or reveal tiles) with smooth animations.

Add a live countdown timer to Valentine’s Day that updates in real time and counts down to the next occurrence of February 14 (if the current date is past Feb 14 for the current year, target Feb 14 of the next year).

Include soft romantic instrumental background music with a visible mute/unmute toggle; default behavior should respect browser autoplay restrictions by starting playback only after a user interaction if autoplay is blocked.
Add a continuous background animation of falling rose petals and/or floating hearts that is subtle, romantic, and does not hinder readability or performance (should remain smooth on mobile).

Add a prominent “Surprise” button that opens a romantic pop-up/modal displaying exactly: “Numa Sharma, you are my forever Valentine ❤️” and includes an accessible close action (button and Escape key).
Add a beautiful footer that says exactly: “Made with endless love for Numa Sharma ❤️” and style it to match the site’s romantic aesthetic.
Generate and include required static visual assets (placed in frontend/public/assets/generated) and wire them into the UI (gallery images and any decorative backgrounds/overlays used by sections).

Add the two user-uploaded images ("Messenger_creation_358DDD99-4DC4-4B99-9AB8-F8F5604864CA.jpeg" and "Messenger_creation_358DDD99-4DC4-4B99-9AB8-F8F5604864CA-1.jpeg") to the website by including them as additional items in the existing romantic photo gallery (the "Our Beautiful Moments" section).

new_feature_requests.summary: Design and build responsive Valentine’s Day homepage with romantic aesthetic (blush pink/deep red/champagne gold/warm white), smooth scrolling, glowing effects, and fade-in transitions
Hero section featuring the name “Numa Sharma” in an elegant cursive/handwritten font
Heartfelt love message section with a beautifully styled love letter
Romantic photo gallery with heart-shaped or softly rounded frames
Interactive “Reasons Why I Love You” section (click/tap to reveal sweet messages)
Live countdown timer to Valentine’s Day
Soft romantic instrumental background music with mute/unmute toggle
Background animation effect (falling rose petals and/or floating hearts)
“Surprise” button that opens a romantic pop-up message: “Numa Sharma, you are my forever Valentine ❤️”
Footer text: “Made with endless love for Numa Sharma ❤️”
Add the user-provided uploaded image to the website (placement to be chosen by implementer since user said 'Your choice')

projectName: Romantic Valentine’s Day single-page website for Numa Sharma
